title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Stay cozy and warm with the simple touch of a button! Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater – perfect for keeping your favorite spaces like your home, dorm, office, or kitchen snug and comfortable.

This user-friendly heater is designed with your needs and safety in mind. It offers two heat settings: a gentle 750W for a lighter touch of warmth and a robust 1500W for those chillier days, ensuring you're just right, no matter the weather. Plus, with its efficient fan mode, you can enjoy improved air circulation without added heat.

Worried about safety? The KISSAIR heater comes with built-in overheat protection that automatically turns the heater off if it gets too hot. Additionally, it features tip-over protection that shuts the heater off if it's knocked over at a 45-degree angle, giving you peace of mind.

Compact and portable, this heater measures just 7.72 inches wide, 6.38 inches deep, and 9.13 inches tall, and weighs a mere 2.6 pounds. It's easy to move from room to room, so the warmth follows you wherever you go. 

With the PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) ceramic heating element, you can expect to feel the heat in no time – it starts warming your space in just 2 seconds! And don't worry about any noisy distractions; this heater operates below 45 dB, making it as quiet as a library.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, ensuring it meets high safety and performance standards. Its intuitive controls and built-in thermostat make it a breeze to use – no complicated buttons or settings!

Enjoy the simplicity and comfort of the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat, and make your personal space warm and inviting without any fuss. It's the perfect companion for anyone who appreciates a warm, cozy corner to relax in.

Warm up your space with ease and safety using the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. Perfect for any home, dorm, office, or kitchen, this sleek black heater is designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind, making it an ideal choice for our respected elderly customers who appreciate straightforward and reliable products.

Key Features of the KISSAIR Space Heater:

- **Two Heating Options**: Choose between a gentle warmth at 750W or a more robust heat at 1500W to keep your space just right.
- **Instant Comfort**: With a rapid heating time of just 2 seconds, you won't have to wait to feel cozy.
- **Quiet Operation**: The heater operates below 45 dB, ensuring a quiet and peaceful environment.
- **Safety First**: Equipped with both overheat protection and a tip-over protection feature that automatically turns the heater off if tipped over at a 45-degree angle, you can relax without concern.
- **Easy to Move**: At just 2.6 pounds and with a compact design (7.72"W x 6.38"D x 9.13"H), it's easy to carry and place wherever you need it most.
- **Fan Mode**: Not just for heat, the fan mode circulates air to keep your room comfortable in any season.
- **User-Friendly**: With intuitive controls and a built-in thermostat, adjusting the temperature is a breeze.
- **ETL Certified**: Rest assured, this heater meets rigorous safety and reliability standards.

Whether you are looking to warm up a chilly kitchen or keep your toes toasty in the living room, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat is a dependable companion for staying comfortable all year round. Enjoy the warmth without the worry!
